name: That's Not My Neighbour
thats-not-my-neighbour
game.s_dis: That's Not My Neighbour is a 1950s job simulator where you play as a doorman, checking documents and appearances to prevent doppelgangers from entering an apartment building.
game.l_dis:
Play That's Not My Neighbour – 1950s Job Simulator with Sci-Fi Twist

That's Not My Neighbour – Unblocked is a unique simulation game where players step into the shoes of a doorman in 1955. Your job is to carefully verify identities and prevent doppelgangers from entering the apartment building.

What is That's Not My Neighbour?

The game combines job simulation with science fiction and horror elements. Each day, you must compare people's documents, appearances, and information against the daily list to determine whether they can enter or must be reported to the Department of Doppelganger Detection (D.D.D.).

How to Play

  • Check identities: Verify documents and appearance carefully.
  • Compare with the list: Use the daily list to confirm who is allowed in.
  • Report doppelgangers: If something is suspicious, alert the D.D.D.
  • Manage time: Quickly and accurately process visitors before the day ends.
  • Pay attention to detail: Small errors can have consequences, so stay vigilant.

Key Features

  • Immersive 1950s Setting: Retro design and atmosphere with sci-fi elements.
  • Observation Challenge: Test your attention to detail and accuracy.
  • Job Simulation: Experience the daily responsibilities of a doorman.
  • Progressive Difficulty: Each day introduces more complex identity checks.
  • Unique Concept: Blends horror, sci-fi, and simulation into a compelling gameplay loop.

Why Play That's Not My Neighbour?

If you enjoy simulation games with strategy, observation, and a touch of suspense, That's Not My Neighbour provides a challenging and memorable experience.

Guard the Building and Spot the Impostors

Can you keep doppelgangers out and manage your day perfectly?
